item.title: Otis Redding - Sittin' on the Dock of the Bay - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Sittin' on the Dock of the Bay performed by Otis Redding.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Faith - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Faith performed by Stevie Wonder. Chords used in the song: C7, D7, G7.

item.title: Queen Naija - Butterflies - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Butterflies performed by Queen Naija. Chords used in the song: Dmaj7, Em7, F♯m, Gmaj7.

item.title: The Commitments - Mustang Sally - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Mustang Sally performed by The Commitments. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Isn't She Lovely - Key of C - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song Isn't She Lovely performed by Stevie Wonder. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D7, E7, F, G.

item.title: Bill Withers - Lovely Day - Key of F - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Lovely Day performed by Bill Withers. Chords used in the song: B♭m7, B♭maj7, Cm7, C♯maj7, Dm7, E♭, F.

item.title: Gene Chandler - Duke Of Earl - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Duke Of Earl performed by Gene Chandler. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Gene Chandler - Duke Of Earl - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Duke Of Earl performed by Gene Chandler. Chords used in the song: B♭, C, Dm, F.

item.title: Gene Chandler - Duke Of Earl - Baritone Ukulele - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Duke Of Earl performed by Gene Chandler. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Fats Domino - Blueberry Hill - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Blueberry Hill performed by Fats Domino. Chords used in the song: B7, Bdim7, C, C7, E7, F, Fm, G7.
